objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF4500'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#8B0000'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='circleGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFD700'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF8C00'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#000000' opacity='0.8' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='290' fill='#000000'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#circleGradient)'/><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M100,200 L200,100' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M880,200 L980,100' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M100,880 L200,980' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M880,880 L980,980' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='4'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='930' cy='150' r='10' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='150' cy='930' r='10' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='10' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='300' cy='300' r='15' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='780' cy='300' r='15' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='300' cy='780' r='15' fill='#FFD700'/><circle cx='780' cy='780' r='15' fill='#FFD700'/></g><path d='M250,500 L350,450 L450,500 L350,550 Z' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.3' transform='rotate(15, 350, 500)'/><path d='M630,780 L730,730 L830,780 L730,830 Z' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.3' transform='rotate(-15, 730, 780)'/></svg>

objects.text: • REAL CHEESE • CRISPY TEXTURE • PACK OF 64

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 1 Count ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a striking promotional layout for a snack product with bold, contrasting visual elements. The background features a vivid radial gradient transitioning from bright orange-red at the center to deep crimson at the edges, enhanced with graphic accents and a central black circle bordered in gold. A large product image is centrally placed atop this circle. The heading (`heading`) sits prominently at the top in thick, white playful font, while the subheading (`subheading`) follows below in bold yellow, offering flavor details. The price (`price`) is highlighted in a yellow bubble to the right. A concise feature list (`description`) and a clear call-to-action button (`cta`) complete the footer of the design.

**Color Palette:**
- Bright Orange (#FF4500)
- Deep Red (#8B0000)
- Jet Black (#000000)
- Gold Yellow (#FFD700)
- Burnt Orange (#FF8C00)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image features a bold and fiery color palette that conveys energy and flavor. The dominant red background (#C21807) grabs attention and signifies intensity and excitement. The Doritos triangle logo uses black (#000000) and a glowing gradient of orange (#FF7900) and yellow (#FFD700) to emphasize sharpness and edge, while conveying heat and bold taste. The white (#FFFFFF) used in the brand name contrasts strongly against the darker elements, ensuring clarity. The chips themselves show a vibrant orange-yellow hue (#FCA311), enhancing the cheesy appeal. These colors blend seamlessly while effectively spotlighting key brand and product features.
